aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Discover our story, meet our team, and explore the values that drive our sports club.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.content1: Since our founding in 2020, our sports club has been a beacon for fitness enthusiasts, aspiring athletes, and families alike. Our mission is to empower individuals to achieve their best selves, both physically and mentally.
journey.content2: From state-of-the-art facilities to a welcoming community atmosphere, weâ€™re dedicated to making fitness accessible for everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To inspire a healthy and active lifestyle for people of all ages through engaging sports programs and fitness activities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To foster community wellness by providing top-tier facilities, expert guidance, and a welcoming environment.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: We believe in teamwork, integrity, and continuous improvement as the foundation for personal and community success.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: A group of passionate and experienced professionals dedicated to your success.

members.name: Alex Johnson
members.description: A seasoned coach with over 15 years of experience in training athletes across multiple disciplines.

members.name: Sarah Williams
members.description: Specializes in personalized fitness programs and nutrition guidance for a balanced lifestyle.

members.name: Michael Lee
members.description: A certified yoga instructor with expertise in mindfulness and flexibility training.
